QuestData.Title: Damage Control
QuestData.Description: Kor'ik has been sending signals to the empress for weeks. Everything the Klaxxi have done, the empress knows about.$b$bThat stops now!$b$bKypari Ik will be the first to receive news of Kor'ik's demise. It would benefit us to make sure that message does not make it to the empress.$b$bDestroying the whisperers and beacon there will buy us enough time to come up with a plan before the empress can act.
QuestData.LogDescription: Destroy 5 Ik'thik Whisperers and deactivate the Kypari Ik Beacon.
